divorce.siUser: The person you married is on the server, you cannot force a divorce, you must mention
divorce.mensajeForce:
{author} you agree to force separation forever from ({miembro})?
__*You have 60 seconds to answer yes or no*__
divorce.divorcioForce: Now you are separated, without compromises ... without love </3
divorce.noDivorcioForce: Unfortunately *(or fortunately)* you have regretted the divorce.
divorce.noTiempoForce: It took you a while to respond ... take your time to think about it
divorce.mensaje:
{miembro} you agree to separate forever from {author} and destroy what since `{fecha}` was his unconditional love declared to all?
__*You have 60 seconds to answer yes or no*__
divorce.divorcio: Now they are separated, without compromises ... without love </3
divorce.noDivorcio: Regrettably *(or fortunately)* {miembro} Don't accept this decision, you should talk to him first and make this work :3
divorce.noTiempo: It took a while to respond ... maybe he got angry *- Run -*.
